description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTTyphoidTy21a for IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a typhoid vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Live attenuated Ty21a vaccine schedule
